desc.p: Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 15 characters may be entered.
Fields ASSET.TYPE to PERCENTAGE form a related multi value set.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 5 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the SC.PM.PRESENT file.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields ASSET.TYPE to PERCENTAGE form a related multi value set.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 5 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the ASSET.TYPE file.
Fields ASSET.TYPE to PERCENTAGE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 rate field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 09 characters may be entered.
This is a multi valued field. Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 35 characters may be entered.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Fields ASSET.TYPE to PERCENTAGE form a related multi value set. Standard T24 rate field.
Mandatory input.
A maximum of 09 characters may be entered.
